predicate.note: Frames file for 'emasculate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: As partisans of congressional power understand , a `` power of the purse '' so broadly construed [*] would emasculate the presidency and swallow the principle of separation of powers .
example.arg: As partisans of congressional power understand
a `` power of the purse '' so broadly construed [*]
